results.name: Inverse permutation to A302783: a(n) = A003188(A052331(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..4096
<a href="/index/Per#IntegerPermutation">Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers</a
program: i = 0; for(n=1,oo,if(ispow2(isprimepower(n)), i++; v050376[i] = n); if(i == up_to,break));

A052331(n) = { my(s=0,e); while(n > 1, fordiv(n, d, if(((n/d)>1)&&ispow2(isprimepower(n/d)), e = vecsearch(v050376, n/d); if(!e, print("v050376 too short!"); return(1/0)); s += 2^(e-1); n = d; break))); (s); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 16 2018
